website_summaries.verdict: Stereo pairing function at a mid-range price.
pros: Durable design with a rubber exterior for protection
Get two and pair them to create left and right channels for premium sound
IPX7 rating means it tests in the waterproof range
cons: Users note a shorter play time than advertised

customer_reviews.title: It Only Worked for SIX MONTHS... But AOMAIS resolved my issue!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in March of 2017, and SIX months later it would no longer charge and would not come on at all, no matter WHAT AC adaptor/USB connector I used to charge it. It would come on all of a few seconds and then power off. I was really enjoying this speaker and so disappointed that it stopped working. Shortly after expressing my disappointment in a customer comment on Amazon, a representative from the AOMAIS customer support team emailed me and offered to send me another speaker. I received a replacement speaker within a week and all is well. The speaker is working great, and my customer satisfaction has returned! THANK YOU AOMAIS FOR RESOLVING MY ISSUE!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing and for the price, it is loud, lasts about 2 days on one charge, and pairs automatically. It's fully waterproof and is safe sitting next to the pool, beach or wherever your travels take you. Update (1/11/18): After owning this speaker for 3 months it developed an issue that if I tried to go above 1/2 volume it would cut out and turn off. After contacting the company they sent me a replacement free of charge. I appreciate a company that stands behind there product and even more importantly behind there customers! I hope to find other items down the road to purchase through Aomais.
customer_reviews.author: Planekiller1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Value!
customer_reviews.text: I did a TON of research and comparisons on portable speakers with Bluetoooth capability before purchasing and I would certainly buy this one again! Sound quality is excellent, automatically pairs with devices it has previously paired with, and loud! Sounds excellent at max volume which seems rare with speakers at this price point. I have not tested just how waterproof this speaker is, but I am confident it will be just fine. They send a floating device with it as well. Excellent product and value!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers - Be sure to buy two for exceptional stereo sound!  Great by the pool, camping, grilling!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are spectacular! Very satisfied with this purchase. The individual speaker sound is very good. Not exceptional, but very good, especially considering the waterproof design. However, when you purchase the pair of these and sync two speakers they play in STEREO sound, and the sound becomes exceptional. Small speaker - Check. Bluetooth - Check. Weather/waterproof - Check. Great sound - Check. Reasonable price - Check. The one minor complaint I have - getting the two speakers to sync together can be a bit clumsy. Every time you connect via Bluetooth you need to guess which speaker is the 'master' speaker or the stereo sync will not operate as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M Regouski

customer_reviews.title: No longer charges....bummer.
customer_reviews.text: Update: incredible customer service. Honored the warranty and sent a new speaker. Let the music play ! Original review: I really enjoyed this speaker. I thought the sound was great, perfect for the backyard or the shower. I purchased this in August last year in part to provide audio while watching outdoor movies. Last week my speaker needed a charge and for some reason it won’t. Now I have an orange and black paper weight. Is anyone familiar with how to use the warranty? I would love to get a replacement, as I said when it works this thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fell

customer_reviews.title: I'd suggest you read this. Called, texted, and emailed me to send me another speaker.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Sound is dull, music is lifeless, and has no real bass. Since I made my review I've been contacted over a half year later to get a new speaker or a refund in exchange for making my review 4 stars or higher and saying just "good product" per there email. Buyer beware. Basically buying good reviews. Since they decided to contact me I believe I will go ahead and update my review. Taking away one star for durability. The speaker now has a loose part rattling around that's metal and when it contacts the speakers magnets it makes noise even when off. This is a possible fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sturgen

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who says this sounds good does not have ears. The sound is hollow and lacks warmth. I've gotten better sound out of products half this size and half this price. Totally not worth it. I have no idea why this has so many good reviews. You'll get better sound putting your phone in a cup then pairing it to this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Landon

customer_reviews.title: At least one of two is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for the ability to pair them. One works well, however the other is trash. Separate them more than 5 feet and the second one will become staticky or cut out completely. Connecting to this bad one directly has similar problems, so perhaps this second one has a bad antenna or something. I got these speakers so I could easily pair two of them, to reach between rooms seamlessly. Since this isn’t possible, as at least one of them is bad/defective, it makes buying these speakers pointless for me. Perhaps I got unlucky and got a defective unit. Regardless, this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: aRandomGuyDudeFellow

customer_reviews.title: Great for a while, then nothing
customer_reviews.text: Well I wasn't considering that this thing would last forever, and it didn't, so those expectations were met. I had Ordered two of these on September 16, 2017 and one has stopped turning on completely. Overall for the price wasn't bad and they sound decent. They paired together fairly well. Only issue i had with them until one died was that the buttons are too close together and being under a thick layer of rubber you have to push the buttons hard. Also dont even think the "bass" speaker is even hooked up to anything or is fake. No instructions and learned how to use off a youtube video. Overall id recommend something else for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Tre A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker while it works
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like the product but the fact that it just stopped working out of nowhere really sucks. I liked this speaker because it was waterproof and I didn't need to worry about if it would get messed up if I used it in my shop. It sounded awesome and never had any issues with it until one day it just stopped connecting to bluetooth. I've went down the line of possible things to check and unfortunately narrowed it down to the speaker. Really liked the speaker but it just didnt last long.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor sound quality too
customer_reviews.text: Durable little speaker but 4 hours of play time, when it was advertised at 10, just doesn't cut it. Pretty poor sound quality too. Overall disappointing and I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Happy custy
customer_reviews.text: After reading all these positive reviews, I decided to take the plunge and purchase this bad boy and boy am I happy i did! Fantastic quality, adventure/waterproof, loud volume- it's an all around great speaker and I can't wait to bring it everywhere! It even comes with a little pool float to attach it to! How awesome is that! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: K. guerra

customer_reviews.title: They offered to send me a "replacement" and have emailed me twice, texted me twice offering a refund if I change my review.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks. 3-4 hours at 100% volume. Every time you connect it will set volume to 50%. Has no built in amp and is not that loud. For some reason when using my phone battery drains faster. After writing this review they emailed me and somehow got my phone number and texted me twice trying to buy me off to change this review. DO NOT TRUST THE POSITIVE REVIEWS.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Coates

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought Oct 2016. It is not a good sounding as my Bose Soundlink III, but GREAT sound for the size and price! And it's water resistant! Edit Jan 3, 2018: Will not turn on and will not charge. I didnt really get that much use out of it. Bummer because I liked it. Gonna drop rating from 5 to 2 stars. Edit Jan 19, 2018: I emailed the support with my issue and they sent a replacement to my surprise. But for some reason it had the SAME issue with not charging. After a few more emails to support, they did finally send another replacement speaker that works. I'll change my rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tim65gt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Update to 7/ 28/ 2018 After a few misunderstandings with their customer service dept, I finally got my new speaker replacement . I fully charged it , and it seems to be working beautifully like it should👍 I’m hoping this new improved speaker will last me for a longtime . The sounds is incredible and having two , Now that I have my second speaker working fine , I can now successfully pair them for a wonderful stereo sound affect . Totally recomend them 👍
customer_reviews.author: Al Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect correctly
customer_reviews.text: The device when connected by Bluetooth disables all other wirelessly connected devices. It is completely useless if I can't connect it and my monitor at the same time. Furthermore, all other devices are disabled even when it is no longer connected. The device must be completely and permanently removed before other devices will function again. It is beyond a poor design, it is harmful to install.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as older product
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not the same as the original product. I purchased a new one to replace a damaged older model. First off it will not stereo sync with the older unit. The sound is not nearly as crisp as the older unit. If i do not power it down when stopping the music it will drain the battery. The older unit would auto power off after a few minutes. I should have returned within the thirty days but had other things that were more important.
customer_reviews.author: Reslop

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Crackly speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I wish i could write a positive review bc I loved the sound AT FIRST for a cheap speaker. I love that its waterproof and Shock proof. However i received this on April 6th 2019 and by May 10 literally 4 days after the return window closed- now the speakers are blown and sound crackly :/ i am very upset with this situation now i cant listen to tunes and im only halfway along my journey down the coast. I am going to try and reach out to Aomais and see if they will fix this situation. If they help ill update otherwise stsy away from this it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H Freeman

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome and we still use them - our wedding was ...
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for outdoor sound at our wedding. For $30 a pop, I was not expecting much. They are awesome and we still use them - our wedding was almost a year ago. I love that you can pair two together for surround sound, they get SO LOUD and they are pretty easy to operate for being very simple. The only qualm I have is the buttons are kind of hard to press for my wimpy little fingers but who cares. They worked perfectly for our wedding and I'm sure we've gotten our moneys worth out of them many times over.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had several different phones and this Bluetooth speaker always had connectivity issues it will connect you then unconnect then do it again and when it did connect it will play choppy and it doesn't get that loud. It says its indestructible, waterproof, that's great if you can get it to stay connected to play. I wouldn't buy it and it's too late for me to return it and it started happening from them beginning when I got it but I didn't know about Amazon's great return policies back then I would have been sent this thing back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker in January 2019, and loved it! It was loud (I paired it with my laptop and played my youtube list of music all the time, also my phone). Had great sound, rich bass. But the past couple of months, I noticed it just couldn't be turned up as loud, even after a full charge. Now, it's no louder than my laptop speakers--in fact, they're louder! There is no turning it up--it's just cooked. I would have thought it would last longer than 11 months. Spend your money on something else.....
customer_reviews.author: Beth Clarke

customer_reviews.title: GONE DOWNHILL - save your money
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these about a year ago, and got this speaker specifically to pair with the one I already had. This "2020 Upgrade" has notably worse sound quality at low volume and WILL NOT PAIR with the other Aomais II speaker I got last spring. Between its inability to deliver on speaker pairing (I've read the instructions and hunted online) and the significantly scratchier quality I'm very disappointed. I wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought another.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Aomais spot speaker. This speaker pairs easily and receives well. It works great with my echo dot. This speaker puts out good sound and a surprising amount of base for a small speaker. I have not tried to use it after fully submersing it in water, but I have used it in the rain with no problems. It comes with a small "floaty" to use it in a pool, a charge cord, and a 3.5 to 3.5 cord. This speaker will also connect to my first one, while it won't be true stereo, it does bring my music from both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C in East TX

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality Is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality from this speaker and it's much louder than I expected. We used this most of the day on Thanksgiving day and half day the next day; didn't have to re-charge battery. Bluetooth connection to my iPhone was easy/simple ... I didn't even have to read the instructions on how to pair. This is mu 2nd one as my brother heard the first one and quickly swooped it up, so I had to get another. Several of my other family members placed orders for this on Cyber Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Giniam

customer_reviews.title: Good value, and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good for such a small speaker, and has a bass port in the back that does a good job. I got two and paired them to each other, and used them in two different locations and used my iPhone bluetooth as the source. They advertise using two to produce 'stereo', but I really don't believe that they separate right and left channels, but as real audiophiles know, you have to be centered between the speakers to appreciate real stereo separation if its there. My purpose was to broadcast the same music in two separate locations, and that worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Philip R Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I returned and received a different unit and it works beautifully. No one likes to get a lemon but it happens to everyone here and there. I use this radio to listen to podcasts in the shower every morning; I love it. The sound quality is fantastic and gets louder than I expected. I'm looking forward to taking it to the beach and other places. The little floaty that comes with it for pool use is great, too. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Cool speaker but the sound had this horrible rattling/tinny sound on every song at every volume. I decided to return it after about 45 seconds of playing with it. Hopefully the replacement is half decent...
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Unsure.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked and paired after a full charge. Portability is wonderful. Pairing is very easy and the sound is great! I bought a second one to have one in the front of the house and one in the back. My problem is that in less than a year, the first one stopped working completely. It won't charge; and no LED indicator lights are lit. I've emailed the vendor through Amazon's process today and am awaiting a reply; hopefully within two days. Will return the unopened, second one if the vendor won't work with me.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good sound That's about all
customer_reviews.text: These units are kinda large and have good sound. But that's all. Their controls (which do not work well) are like "hold these two buttons until you hear three beeps" They do not connect together well and the sequence of holding buttons down to do it rarely works. When I got it to finally work hey ran for a while then just stopped. One of the speaker would not reset to bluetooth then would not power off (had to let battery run completely down) . Gave them to the kids to use in their rooms where they can be left on and connected. They are ok for that... But as portable speaker they are pretty worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought 12/3/19 broke yesterday 02/11/20 It does sound great; especially for $25. Battery life is okay; about 15 as stated. Bluetooth connectivity is fantastic. 100’ through walls on a job site. It’s awesome that it can skip the track forward/reverse. Speaks the power level when you turn it on. Charges while playing and charges pretty quickly. Broke yesterday. The port that accepts your charging cable, broke off and fell into the speaker itself.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound ! Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy as the speaker stopped working ! It will not charge ! It will not turn on! Use it five times and stopped working. The warranty ran out and I was offered $5.99 !! Very disappointing on the product warranty and I loved the sound but hate that it stopped working! I would stay away from it ! Customer service is in China and will not fix since you have to ship to China for repairs ! I loved the sound but hate the customer service! Correction , customer service contacted me and offered to replace the speaker! I love the speaker as it has amazing sound ! I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: phillip fong

customer_reviews.title: My intentions were to enjoy it for many years not just one. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was just contacted by the manufacturer about my concerns. They are honoring their product by sending me a replacement. I loved this little stereo! The only thing I don’t like is that it has now stopped working. I had it for about 12 months and the on and off button has always been a little hard. But now it won’t even turn on. I’m disappointed in the longevity of this product when I bought it My intentions were to enjoy it for many years not just one. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tami davis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I purchaded this speaker to amplify sound from echo dot. This unit sounds incredible. For the size its 20 watt sound fills my bedroom. However, the volume control buttons consistently either advance and rewind proram. Uggg. I wish there was a remote as no matter where you place your finger on controls adjusting volume is a hit or miss. After contact with manufacturer, a replacement product or refund has been offered. The product is actually a good product. Sometimes you get a defective product. However, this company stands by it product and. Reputation.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker thinking it would be really loud. It's decent, but not as loud as I'd like. I bought it for work, and working outdoors with loud environment, I need the sound to travel so I can enjoy over all other noises. I would have been better off buying headphones then this.. However it does work great being waterproof so that's a huge plus, and I kept it for pool parties and for little kids to use.. I am looking for a much louder better speaker still..
customer_reviews.author: Ed Stubbs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it's not a bad speaker... not great, but not terrible. I don't care at all about sound quality. But getting it to work is the problem. I TRIED to get it to pair with my phone. Researching online, reading the pamphlet more times than I can count. Even checking my phone's Bluetooth version to make sure it was compatible with the speaker. NOTHING. If I wanted a wired speaker I would buy a wired speaker. Not getting the one and only use out of this product I was looking for is so frustrating and I WILL be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to purchase this product. It has good reviews. Unfortunately it was a waste of my money. Charged it an used it for the first time while tubing. It connected easy. Made sure the side port was closed tight as the sticker directs. It was in a tube with all our belongings the moment it got splashed it lost connectivity with my phone and just became glitchy. Now it doesn’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: They changed the speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact model 2 years ago. An orange one. That speaker sounds much better. The older one and this new one (green) will NOT pair. That's y I bought a second one. Also, the older one has voice function for phone calls. The one I just ordered doesn't. In addition, the older one has a screw mount on the bottom to put on a light stand. The new one doesn't. I don't know why they are labeled with the same model number. They are different speakers. It's a shame that the audio quality got worse. Now I will resort to other sites to find the same type of speaker from two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker because it was recommended by a friend and was in dire need of a new one. I've had this speaker since Jul 19, 2018. The battery life seems to decrease as I find my speaker dying on me after 5 hours which is nowhere near 20 hours as described on the item. The sound quality is also lacking in my personal opinion- I find myself constantly wanting to listen to music louder only to realize that's not an option with this speaker. As previous reviewers mentioned, the sound does get choppy out of no where and the buttons are hard to press.
customer_reviews.author: Nandi

customer_reviews.title: Work great individually. Not together
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product Jan 9th 2019 and another Jan 26th 2020. The same exact model Aomis sport II. Not the Aomis sport II +. I purchased another for an upcoming trip to be able to pair together and play music as one. Unfortunately they are not able to pair together because they were made 1 year apart even though they are the same model. Overall, I love the product, but with the inability to pair together unless I buy another made in 2020 I will be returning. Spoke with 3 customer service reps. 1st one great. Next 2 were mediocre and passed me off saying refer to manufacturer. Unfortunate because I like the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and the quality is great for such a small speaker system
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and the quality is great for such a small speaker system. I purchased it for camping, but I like quality of the sound so much I use it a home all the time with my ipod nano 7 using Bluetooth. I can even control my ipod from the speaker system. Even great for when the power goes out, which it has for me a few times in the past month. Bob
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Great except for Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great, except the Bluetooth is not convenient if you want to be able to alternate from day to day between two devices -- for me, my phone and my husband's phone. Once the Bluetooth has been connected to one phone, it is a headache to convince it at a later time to connect to a new phone without having one person turn off their Bluetooth, or completely reconnecting the device entirely, at which point it creates a duplicate of itself and then you end up with a list of bluetooth devices in your phone, i.e., AOMAIS Sport 1, AOMAIS Sport 2, AOMAIS Sport 3, and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Erstad

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, durable
customer_reviews.text: This thing rode around with me in my backpack for a few weeks in Mexico recently. It's had water spilled on it, frequently been in 90 degree weather, been covered in sand, thrown around (in my backpack) and played me sweet beach tunes for hours at a time and I haven't had to charge it yet. The bass is bumpin, you can hear it pretty well even over wind and waves, and everyone thinks it's really cute. Can walk a little ways away with your phone without the music cutting out. I love it, it seems to hold up great, and it's totally coming with me on my kayak all this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke A.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy at first
customer_reviews.text: When I got this speaker I was surprised and delighted with the sound quality and volume it pushed out. It was OK for a connected CD player but sometimes it would shut itself down in the middle of a CD thinking it wasn't connected to a device - I'm guessing. Phone connection was fine and the primary music source. I've used this speaker fairly infrequently except in the Summer and after only 2 years the bluetooth connectivity is failing. It just looses connectivity even though my phone is sitting right next to it. 2 months ago the charging cable connector went bad but that could be replaced. Now to look for a replacement speaker.
customer_reviews.author: D_Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, really want a volume control.
customer_reviews.text: And the reason is that right on the first video I played, the recording was too soft and I could not crank the volume higher and had a hard time. With a "local" volume control that would have been not an issue. This is the only bad thing I found, though minor. All other "louder videos" were great. It feels heavy for its size, the sound quality is excellent, the connectivity is spot on - meaning, wife had no problem using it after I showed her how to par and use the thing. Interesting, it has a threaded bolt embedded in the bottom so you can, conveniently, set it on a tripod, nice ! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alexdelara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is trash. It worked once and never worked properly again. It wasn’t dropped or damaged. Won’t hold a charge, static when connected with aux, and when using Bluetooth the sound cuts out every 5 seconds. I’m throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A good functional and reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a poolside speaker enabling music etc. from a smartphone to be safely heard in a very wet area. My phone is waterproof but I feared that continuous use at highest volume would drastically shorten the life of its internal lithium battery. When the phone was in a wireless charger it would play loudly for hours but tended to overheat. This unit stays loud and stays cool and even if it is knocked into the water it is unharmed. The phone can sit on a table far from the pool and not work so hard since it is not blasting out sound at its highest volume.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lukacs

customer_reviews.title: Works well...until it doesn't...
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I've had this speaker for three years, but I keep it at the cabin, so it rarely gets used. Last time I tried to plug in the Micro USB charger the internal portion broke off and is rattling around inside the speaker. Making the unit useless now. Up until then I was very happy with the sound/connectivity/price (lightening deal). In fact I am in the process of ordering the updated Sport ll+. What do they say...fool me once?! But curious why the ll+ doesn't have auto shut-off? If this one falls apart as well I shall be very put-out! I"ll let ya know...
customer_reviews.author: Akfireftr

customer_reviews.title: Definitely use an equalizer, but overall decent buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in my car mostly since my speakers no longer work, but I wanted a BT speaker anyway and right now I can't really get my car fixed. The sound is a little unbalanced but after activation a basic equalizer preset it gets much clearer and restores some of the lows that are lacking. Overall, it's a decent speaker and if you're not an audiophile like I am it'll probably do just fine for you, if you happen to be looking for FANTASTIC sound rather than just good sound, perhaps look elsewhere. But, this is a good product for the asking price (I paid $30)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I liked what others had said
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought this product..I liked what others had said, and comments about customer service played a huge part in my decision to buy. We have had it for about 3 weeks now & it has performed well.. we have used it mostly to sit on the deck of the pool ..plenty loud enough, and about 8 hours on a fully charged battery. We have only used it about 3 times so far.. and so far no problems, I also bought the extended warranty..
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!  Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was purchashed with a rubber carrying case and has worked well! This item was purchased three years ago. My brother-in-law needs a music system! This speaker paired with a Samsung S4 with Amazon Music will do the trick! Cost: $60 for the speaker, ancient S4, two power cables/plugs and my annual Amazon Prime membership cost. If he screws this up, he is on his own! This sustem is almost too easy to use! Sound is sweet! Definitely good! Great as a gift for a young person! Get carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Ben E.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two of these for a well over a year. I rock the sheet out of them ! 20 watts is 20 watts , Not enough to make your ears bleed but OK. The only issue is the battery life, When I first got them they would play for hours on end on the battery life. Now I'm only getting 3 1/2 hours of battery life out of one of them before it shuts down. I can say I've got my thirty something dollars worth. But now it's got to be plug in more than not.
customer_reviews.author: Vetteman07

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in our boat until we installed a stereo. The sound is good for the price. A speaker this size can't compete with a boat motor but is great for listening to music when we are stopped. I use straps and hang it from the bimini rails if we want to listen to something louder. I set it or hang it on the side rails or cleat near us to listen when others are around and we don't want to force them to hear our music. I bought this speaker on a lightning deal but mostly because of the rubber case with rigid handle.
customer_reviews.author: BeckJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is exactly what I need! I will be going lakeside soon and thought it would be cool to have this one and if I were to go on a boat I wouldn't have to worry about getting water on it. So far it hasnt been around water but I'll definitely update you on the results when I take it up North. The sound is amazing and the battery life is questionable only cuz I don't wanna use it too much before I leave but it definitely doesn't die really fast, I charged it and haven't for a week already and it's not losing power (I listen to music 1-2 hours with it)
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  Upgrade to My 1984 Truck
customer_reviews.text: I brought primarly to have music again in my 1984 Ford truck, replacing my cassette AM/FM radio. This brought that 80's era vehicle into the new millennium with bluetooth-USB-digital music capabilities. Very happy to have the new technology in my old truck. Paired with my iPhone, I now have full access to handsfree conversations and most importantly, a very deep selection of music. The 10 hour play time of the speakers supports my longest leg of any road trips. Will see how it holds up. Update: used this for nearly two years now and still very happy with the product. Battery is holding its charge well and the Blue Tooth works with my upgraded iPhone 8.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: After 9 Months of Good Use, they're slowly getting worse.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers 9 months ago to use at the beach, and now I use it for my room or outside. They sounded pretty good initially, but now one of the speakers is so fuzzy, and it always says louder and was lesser quality than the other speaker, whereas it doesn't sound nearly as clear, the low-ends are gone, and it's louder than the other. Sometimes they connect great, but other times they cut out really bad. Even in my room, a few feet apart and they cut out. Overall these have lasted me a long time and have totally enjoyed them, but idk if I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Herr Doktor

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your hard earned money
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage, it started giving me problems 4 months after I bought it. When connected to bluetooth it skips a lot and it has a static-like scratching sound, you can't even tell what song is playing. It's been very well taken care of, never been near water at all, I even bought the protective cover for it, so its definitely not because of user error. Very dissatisfied and disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Ok but wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I got this and the battery said it was at 90% so I used it till it said 20% and then charged it. When I turned it on battery level said 80% after being on the charger for more then 7 hours. I did contact amazon and they gave me a $5 gift card not to return it! When using the speaker if I pause the music it don’t matter how low my sound is it will at times blast the music as if it was on high even when it’s down low! It’s a nice speaker but wouldn’t purchase another one if this one was lost,stolen or broken would look somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: The_Joker

customer_reviews.title: Tiny price, huge value.
customer_reviews.text: Had this 2 and half years. Used it in my art studio, in my house, outside, and across the country. Good sound, beefy bass for as small as it is, and the battery lasted a long time. Sometimes connecting was a bit of a pain, but I always got it working. It finally died after the USB port chipped inside. Likely from dropping it dozens of times while charging it. Build quality is rather good! I am upgrading tomorrow for a larger stereo, with longer play time. This was easily one of the best little radios I've owned, though. I would recommend it to anyone, and have no problem gifting it. Absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this speaker when she is in the pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because she would use her iphone to listen to music while she was in the pool. I got this because it would be far cheaper than buying a new iphone if it went swimming. Now if you have active people/kids/teens in the pool this may not stay on top of the water but with my wife and I just lazily floating around the pool this is perfect and has much better sound that a phone sitting on a table away from the pool. I have not had a single problem getting this to connect to her iphone so I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Was everything I ever wanted for a few days -- ...
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I ever wanted for a few days -- then it stopped being able to charge. Other people have had similar issues, so buyer beware. edit: I have received a replacement free of charge and without contacting the seller. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We should get stock in this company because so many people have purchased this speaker after experiencing ours. I love the sound we get from it in our house. We also have one at work that’s harder to hear because we have noisy machines all around. But the people in the area can enjoy it. It is easy to connect to my phone’s Bluetooth. I like that it makes a sound when you connect and a different one when disconnect your device. I would (and have!) heartily recommend this speaker. I think it is excellent value for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K.

customer_reviews.title: Good with a complaint
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few years now and use it mainly while showering, but also take outside for the occasional BBQ. Overall I've been very happy with it but I do have one complaint: The buttons aren't that well designed. The volume buttons share functionality with the forward/next/back previous function and no matter how many times I try to adjust the volume it doesn't work. It only skips to the next track or starts the same track over. I have to control the volume with my phone. Not a huge deal but a bit annoying from time to time. Otherwise I've been happy with it. Gets ok sound and decent low end for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality, Some of the negative reviews are comparing it to an older version which I do not have. Based on my use the battery has stay charged with at least 10 hours of use which outlasted my cell phone I was streaming music from. It is water proof I gave it dip in the lake while it was on and playing music on my boat. Hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the purchase of this Bluetooth speaker; it’s worth the money as the sound quality is good, the volume is excellent and the battery life is superb. I’ve probably charged it once or twice since my purchase of this device a month ago. Then again, I only use it for my baths where I like to play music and relax. Still it’s nice not to have to worry about battery life during use. I’ve had speakers that conk out after thirty minutes. You constantly have to have them plugged in. Not so with this one so definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Shopper

customer_reviews.title: One serious design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad sounding speaker, loud and good for using on water, but there is one serious missing feature and hence the 3-stars...there is no place to put a strap cable! This is especially important for me as I use it while kayaking and if I flip my kayak good bye speaker because of no way to secure to the bungee cords of my kayak. Also means I can’t clip it to my backpack when hiking, etc. I would not have bought this if I had noticed this missing feature, first Bluetooth speaker ever that had no way to secure it down.
customer_reviews.author: H20Ski

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small package. In part with higher end units.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this speaker. I bought it on one of the Amazon Instant deal days, and I feel this speaker Rivals the sound quality of the Bose mini sound bar. So frequently when you buy a mini Soundbar it lacks the depth of the bass in music, the speaker does not have that problem. As far as the volume goes, it gets loud. No I mean it gets really loud... Like I can hear it two rooms away clearly. To be honest, knowing what I know now I would have paid full price for the speaker it's still less than the Bose in the quality is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: DarkPsonic

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth went out after 2 months - no good for Echo Dot either
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked fine the first couple of months but now it won't pair with any Apple devices. It did work w/an Apple iPad Mini but then after pairing it with another speaker and then trying to re-find this one it can't. Tried with other Apple devices and none of them find it but they find all other speakers we have just fine. My phone (non-Apple) also won't find it. Pros: Good sound Waterproof Good size and weight Cons: Bluetooth stops working after a couple of months It has an annoying voice that says "powering on"..."powering off"..."low battery" It won't stay on (powers off after 2 min of inactivity) so it's useless for pairing with something like an Echo Dot
customer_reviews.author: Nozama in NC

customer_reviews.title: All I Can Say is WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this speaker. It's powerful. It has great sound. It's so good, and as another reviewer showed, you can run over it with your car. I've used other Bluetooth speakers before and the problem has always been volume, they just don't have the sound, but the AOMAIS Sport II is perfect. It has strong volume and is waterproof. The other thing I love about it is that it pairs perfectly and quickly with my phone. That's been an issue with other speakers but not this one. This is one of the best purchases I've ever made and at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Deeter

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of the battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I give very few reviews and rarely do I give poor ratings. This unit sounded great and worked well for exactly one year. Now it will not charge at all, and there is no way to replace internal battery. I noticed they warranty it for one year...how convenient for them. I would not recommend this item. Update: after the 1 star rating, I was contacted by the company and they replaced the unit. I am grateful to them for reaching out and fixing the issue, they didnt have to do that since it was technically after the expiration of the warranty... so for that, I am changing my star rating. Fingers crossed this one works longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R. Kennelly

customer_reviews.title: Two together and you can put out some impressive sound.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second of the same type. I was happy with my first but decided to try the pairing function by getting a second of the same type. Pairing was easy and, remarkably, they remain paired most of the time when I turn them off. So turning off one turns off the other and when I turn them both back on they automatically pair with each other. Sound quality is very good and in a two car garage they put out enough sound to make conversations difficult so you don't have to run them at full volume. Yes, they will operate while charging as well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great BT speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BT speaker; easily paired, sound quality is very good for rhe size. The music actually has depth, but outside on a windy day it has it's challenges. I have ordered the larger Aomais speaker with the handle $69.99. The newer model is 40w and appears quite a bit larger based on the pics. I'm looking forward to this one to compare the difference when listening outside. Regardless, the Aomais Sport II is a fabulous speaker for the price and would definitely recommend for the home office.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much I'm ordering a second one to pair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product... great sound quality and it lets you you know the battery charge level, too. I've had an Oontz which I purchased on Amazon last year which is still working but, I was never that 100% happy with it. The volume was never consistent (up & down by itself) and the speaker sound was always a second or two behind the video playing. I thought this was normal for a Bluetooth speaker. The AOMAIS Sport II speaker works great and I'm ordering a second one so I can pair them.
customer_reviews.author: The Stynque One

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little Bluetooth speaker is fantastic. It has wonderful sound and perfect ease of use. It is quite powerful for it's size. I keep it in the kitchen to connect to my phone while I'm cooking/cleaning, etc. I caught my son sneaking it out of the house to take on a fishing trip. (He has two speakers of a different brand). I am happy with this purchase and have I enjoyed it very much. I got my grandson one for his birthday and he just loved it. I would definitely purchase something else made by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: A. Long

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: update - after i wrote my review these guys contacted me and offered to send me a replacement for free. that's good customer service which is just as important as the product for me. i'm raising my rating. its OK if you plan on keeping it plugged in at all times and only have one phone connected to it. The battery doesn't hold a charge. Also, my wife and I both are connected to it and It'll always default to one or the other without warning and then you have to turn the bluetooth off on the other phone in order to connect to it.
customer_reviews.author: gnick

customer_reviews.title: Solid frame and sound
customer_reviews.text: The case is sturdy. In comparison to other speakers I’ve bought this one is much louder. Once I got the blue tooth connected I was able to hear my music while cleaning multiple rooms. I was able to move it without losing my music which is very nice. I haven’t tested the waterproof yet and I don’t recommend it unless you can figure out how to protect the bottom. I’m sure there’s a way.
customer_reviews.author: DaKind

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have had other Bluetooth speakers in past. With all of them, I either get low volume or distortion. This little guy pumps out the sound and stays crystal clear while it does it. The speaker is very compact so it will fit just about anyplace. The handy mount on the bottom just makes it more versatile. If I had one wish as with everyone I guess, is that the battery would last a little bit longer. That being said. For the volume and quality, I am happy with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Will No Longer Charge
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price but I guess you get what you pay for. No matter what combination of USB cables and wall adapters I use the device will no longer charge. I recently reached out to their support and will see what happens. Speaker was less then a year old and we only used it like two-three times a month so only charged the thing a few times. Disappointing. Update. Customer support was fairly prompt in sending a replacement speaker. I have yet to receive it. Will hopefully provide an update soon that I have a new, working unit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E. Deal

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little speaker for the price, in my opinion. My only complaint is that it is impossible to fast-forward or rewind tracks. Those buttons simply don't work and it's obnoxious. Otherwise, the sound quality is very decent and it connects to my phone via bluetooth with relative ease. I just wish I could flip through tracks the way the manual says you can. In my experience with portable speakers at this pricepoint, none of them can skip tracks. I wish they wouldn't claim that you can. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service for a quality speaker
customer_reviews.text: The AOMAIS Sport II Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker has nice bass sound. Not too rumbly, but full. The orange outline adds a nice contrast. We haven't used it for wet areas yet, though the rubber plug that covers the ports does fit tightly. Comes with short charging and aux cables. The charging port is a Micro USB. This port on my speaker failed after four months. Fast Customer Service replied within 24 hours to my e-mail. Friendly and direct communication. We came to a very agreeable solution quickly and easily without any nit picking. They just wanted the customer to be happy. I am. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: K.I.

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Whomever said it was heavy, it weighs a lb. For the size I don't expect it to be feather light and I don't necessarily want it to be, it's sturdy and easier to keep track of. It sounds great and linked to my phone's bluetooth immediately and was ready to go and charged out of the box! I bought the sling separately, I'd definitely recommend. I love the color scheme and the voice recognition when powering on/off is a nice little reminder that the device is doing what you want it to. No water test yet but I'll update later with that!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Starkiller

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it gives a competitors a run for its money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I bought one because I was unsure how it was going to handle for the use I used it for. I put it in my side by side thinking I may have to have two. Needless to say you only need one in a four-wheeler it's quite loud I can handle a good beating. I also take it with me when I'm not riding it's Crystal clear has a good base. The only thing is that if you have it at full volume your battery lasts half as much depending on how much volume is on depends on how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough to hear in a pool
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker actually for my mom for Christmas. It had everything that she wanted in a speaker. She wanted one that was lightweight and portable, that it is. She wanted it to have really good sound quality, it has that as well. The last and most important thing was that it was loud enough to hear on her pool deck while you were in the pool. Well I couldn't test it directly in the pool because it is cold right now, but I went around the outermost part of the pool and still could hear it extremely well, so needless to say it has everything she wanted. I can't for her to open it up for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Family3

customer_reviews.title: If you only need it for two months then it is fine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it may seventh dead and unresponsive July seventeen. Seems like not built to last more than two months. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Speaker for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is ok. It's not mind-blowing, but for the cost of the unit it's excellent. If you're looking for higher quality, drop more money on something like a JBL. So far I've been very impressed with the bluetooth range and the battery life. I've also taken it in the shower with me and it hasn't had any problems with the water. I got this for toting around outdoors while I'm working but I've found myself using it inside as well for ambiance. The volume is too quiet if you wanted to use it for a party, but for personal use or for music that you can easily talk over it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Mine sucked
customer_reviews.text: I was using it mostly to listen to audio books & the narrator or the actor that was reading the book was saying half of words every sentences . I made sure it was charged full & the phone wasn’t to far away . I ended up , putting the phone in top of the speaker & it was still loosing or resetting connections. It made for a horrible listening experience . It went back
customer_reviews.author: E=MC2

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: i use this for work everyday, ive dropped this in water buckets, dropped it off a roof of a barn lots of times, still works great update: i ordered this product in march 2018, its now march 2020, still works, its been torture tested, and been through the works, only con is that the battery only lasts 3 hours, its to be expected with 2 years of daily use, every once in a while the sound will be acting up, but we just turn it off, wait an hour and it works fine again.
customer_reviews.author: George Morris

customer_reviews.title: I'm cheap and I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, I'm cheap when it comes to buying stuff, so I was wearing of stepping up from my $15 dollar bt speaker I picked up at the store. I have to say, this speaker is well worth the price, and the volume is amazing. Being waterprof and dustproff are also a huge plus since I normally have it in the kitchen while I'm baking or outside with the kids. Easy connection, just sometimes I have to tell my phone to find it when it turns on, but not an issue. I really am tempted to get a second one to get stereo sound... maybe someday.
customer_reviews.author: ashcatchafew

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing. Great sound, great volume, good bass, great battery life, durable and just a great speaker. I’ve had mine for 2 years and the battery still lasts, quality remains great. Stop your search and just add this to your cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waterproof bluetooth speaker for taking along on kayak trips down rivers and over lakes; as well as for jamming in the shower. It has proven to be as waterproof as they claim it to be. The battery seems to last as long as they claim as well; though I've never run it completely dead in one play; so I can't attend to the total hours of playback; but I have played it for over 12 hours without the battery running down while playing at full volume. Sound quality is very good for a speaker of it's size; but it won't compete with your car or home stereo. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Haglund

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, for an hour or two
customer_reviews.text: Sound from this speaker is great and it paired with my phone easily, but the battery life is short and unpredictable. Every time I'm sure it's fully charged and will function for a few hours, it doesn't. Sometimes it lasts for 3 hours, sometimes only for one. No difference in play conditions - same volume, same playlists, same environment. There's no meter or display to show if the charge is full, just a green light. And no warning of low battery, it just shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy Chris

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRICE BEST QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I am a research junky and these folks have really done it right. This is my second speaker and it even tells you how full the battery is and really goes all night. Super easy to sync up and connect two speakers. Youtube helps if you can't figure it out, but the RCA cable makes it a snap. Shocked it came with one for connecting the two. We listen to it all night and it never went below 50%, sound quality is more than enough and we like it loud.
customer_reviews.author: Chipawa

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for a little less than a month now and at first I really enjoyed it. I use it to listen to music at work. Its sounds quality is pretty good however I do wish it was a little louder. My main problem with it however Is that by the third week of having this speaker the charging indicator led went out and now the speaker hardly charges. I can try to charge it for a few hours and only get 5 minutes of play time. Currently trying to return this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Portable Speakers
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, Yes I love my portable speaker. Its small and compact and serves very good purpose during travel. I wanted something that is not bulky and gives good sound when volume is full and has enough battery life to work overnight. And this speaker has all the features. For me Pairing didn't work very first time but after going through instructions again, it worked. Now you just need to turn it on and it will be paired always. Sound quality is good and it doesn't break on high volume.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G

customer_reviews.title: AMOMAIS Sport II Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Really wow nice sounding and has a great distance for bluetooth. Took it out and charged it for about 2 hours and when I fired this thing up it put a smile on my face. It will be great gift for my 10 yr old. I will have to update later if the speaker has any issues but it seems to be very well made and comes with a float for the pool. I also purchase the Sling Cover that has a handle on it which will help to carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: tracker258

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great sound, and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Connection is great with my Android phone, and my iPad as well. Battery life is spot on for the price as well. There are higher quality, and better sounding speakers on the market, for sure, but the price point on this item makes it a winner. If the option for an inflatable add-on is there, get that as well. We bought for use in the pool and we are very pleased. You can reduce volume and conserve battery life having it float along side of you.
customer_reviews.author: D8nkid

customer_reviews.title: AUX doesn't work well, but costumer service is awesome
customer_reviews.text: My review used to be that shown as below, but the customer service contacted me before I send the return item to a UPS store. My problem is solved right away, and I would like to give a positive review for their great service. - March 29th: Just got it earlier this afternoon and tried it out for the first time. The Bluetooth function works well, but the AUX one doesn't work. The music cut off 5 seconds after I retry it, so I just decided to return this product. The sound quality is pretty nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Tang

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: First, I don't give 5 stars for anything... period! Nothing's perfect and to be honest I haven't had it long enough to fully evaluate it but so far it's 4 stars for sure. Sound quality is great and the volume is amazing, took me by suprise. Bluetooth connected immediately, not one issue. When I bought it, I didn't think about using it near water but now I'm taking it to the beach and lake to play tunes and listen to xmRadio .... I'm impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: G Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Several purchased, one of them won't charge now
customer_reviews.text: Began purchasing these at the end of last summer to keep around the house so there's one no matter where I go. One of them now appears not to be charging, or has a problem. When I plug it in, no light comes on. But if I leave it plugged in overnight, and turn it on and connect to it, the green light will show a charge for maybe ten seconds, then the speaker will play for a bit, then die. I need to review how long the warranty is on this, and how to return for service. Great product, and out of however many I've bought, this is the only one I have a problem with.
customer_reviews.author: Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dies Faster Than I Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of these speakers to use at my warehouse job. I’ve had all different kinds. Sound and volume are good, I have to keep it turned all the way up because of the equipment I work with. My only disappointment is the first night using it on a full battery, it died after about 2 hours. I’ve had other speakers not as loud, but last longer. I bring a portable charger to work, so it wasn’t a catastrophe. My previous speaker started sounding like the speaker was blown within a few months. I hope this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: LFG

customer_reviews.title: Connects quick. Sturdy build. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wasn't expecting much, but was pleasantly surprised! The roughly translated english is passable :) but always makes you chuckle. Potential typo on the adhered decal could cause them trouble as it reads something about being "IN THE WATER" .. so manufacturer MAY want to change that :) .. it's splash proof, that's about it. Not submersible (you would not expect it to be of course). We like it, and for $30, seems a great deal. The audible drum beat when powered on, off or connection signal is neat too. Does not automatically power iff.
customer_reviews.author: 1inTexas

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker that has very high max volume
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker that has very high max volume. It is louder than similar speakers I've tried. Bass is only okay if we're talking speakers in general, but for a unit this small, bass is pretty good. The nicest thing is its form factor (very fun looking) and that it is waterproof, which is great for pool parties etc. Battery life is quite long relative to similar speakers and it feels well assembled. For the price this is an extremely nice unit comparable with higher end units.
customer_reviews.author: Y. HSUEH
